title: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ 1.14.0 released!
content: We are very pleased to announce the 1.14.0 release of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ. This release adds support for CodeActions and Quick Fixes. CodeActions / Quick Fixes When an error is detected on one of your Quarkus project files, it is highlighted in the source editor (for instance when you...
